name: Into the Stars (itch) (Tirion Games)
description:
Into the Stars is a peaceful, simplistic arcade game in which you take control of a spaceship. Dodge flying projectiles to try and achieve the highest score you can, while the background and peaceful music add to the ambience of this simple game.

[NOTE: This game can only be downloaded onto Android devices. It is also available on the Google Play Store.]

This game and all it's assets (excluding fonts) were created by Mikael Christodoulides

V.1 Completed on the 11/7/2020
